document.full_text: tim hetherington, the photographer who was a director and producer of the film 'restrepo,' and chris hondros of the getty photo agency came under fire on the front lines of misurata.
document.title: 'restrepo' director and a photographer are killed in libya
lines_and_colors: tim hetherington, the photographer who was a director and producer of the film 'restrepo,' and chris hondros of the getty photo agency came under fire on the front lines of misurata.
